alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 01 at 10:03AM CST until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Greene and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is forecast to occur tonight and Thursday over the Black Warrior River basin and a flood warning is now in effect for the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 86.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 86.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall to 85.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will rise above flood stage Friday evening to 93.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
